text: Tara tiniharumadhye jo ramro jnani chan ra jo momina chan, tiniharule yasa kitabamathi juna tapa'imathi utariyo ra juna kitaba tapa'ibhanda pahila utari'e sabaimathi astha rakhdachan ra namaja padhdachan ra jakata (dharmadaya) didachan ra allaha ra kiyamatako dinamathi astha rakhdachan, tiniharula'i hamile (sighra nai) thulo puraskara pradana garnechaum
